attributes.action: Ban any person in the uk with a walking stick from making the noise "Tap, Tap"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With out doubt this is the most disrespectul comment known. For example. " I am Waiting......"Tap Tap" or if you are trying to concentrate and all you can her is some one "Tap Tapping" 

I believe the only Solution to this would be to make all walking Sticks Hallow. Hallow enough to firmly fit a cigar in to one end and able to inhale from the top of the stick.  

This would also enable smoking Brown Cigars on local Transport as you could be sat down but the Cigar is actually outside the window. 

but until this is invented we need to make a ban!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
